job_details.Vacaturetitel: Exam Developer with focus on AI Engineering
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in various systems. Additionally, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.

   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative, and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.

Where you come in

   You are part of a committed team of Exam Developers, working closely with the Product Owner to ensure that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market. You coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices, and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events

   What's in it for you?

   You get the opportunity to further develop your exam-related skills and experience in generative AI, your language skills, and your project management skills. You are part of a strong, hard-working team, that has lots of fun along the way. We offer you the opportunity to join us in creating a healthier digital world. At EXIN, you can make a difference by helping people skill up and be the right fit for their (next) job and by helping organizations ensure they can trust they have the right people on board to deliver their (digital) strategies.

   If you share our belief that independent assessment of knowledge and competencies must be critical for a healthier digital world, you'll be at the heart of progress at EXIN. We offer a role with a great deal of variety, which means you have the opportunity to develop new skills. You'll also have possibilities for continuous learning and access to unique knowledge. Once the exam development processes are including generative AI, you can finetune these and help other teams with their generative AI-related requests.

   You will work in an environment of fun, diverse, and highly educated people. Work schedules are flexible and many of us successfully plan around our young families. Our organization structure is flat, providing room for your initiatives and ideas., Applicants must submit a CV and motivation letter in English. Applications without these documents will not be considered.
   Software Improvement Group

   Software is het DNA van onze samenleving geworden
   Dankzij software werkt inmiddels bijna elk apparaat, elk proces en elke toepassing in ons dagelijks leven. Het maakt ook werken en ondernemen makkelijker en interessanter. En we gaan ervan uit dat het allemaal nog sneller, eenvoudiger en veiliger wordt. Dat is een uitdaging voor veel bedrijven en organisaties.
   Softwarekwaliteit moet nog een inhaalslag maken
   Om…

   Software is het DNA van onze samenleving geworden
   Dankzij software werkt inmiddels bijna elk apparaat, elk proces en elke toepassing in ons dagelijks leven. Het maakt ook werken en ondernemen makkelijker en interessanter. En we gaan ervan uit dat het allemaal nog sneller, eenvoudiger en veiliger wordt. Dat is een uitdaging voor veel bedrijven en organisaties.

   Softwarekwaliteit moet nog een inhaalslag maken
   Om aan de vraag te kunnen voldoen, is veel software in de loop van de tijd ongecontroleerd doorontwikkeld. Waardoor het voor organisaties duur is in onderhoud, weinig flexibel en kwetsbaar. Zo wordt software eerder een belemmering dan aanjager van betere bedrijfsresultaten.

   SIG gelooft dat software beter kan
   Daarmee bedoelen we: software die organisaties helpt hun doelen te realiseren. Die meebeweegt met de veranderende wensen van de markt en de samenleving. Daarom werken we aan betere softwarekwaliteit, wereldwijd. We willen de kwaliteit van de softwareindustrie verbeteren door bij te dragen aan internationale standaarden. We weten hoe we softwarekwaliteit moeten meten. En we weten hoe organisaties méér uit software kunnen halen.
   IT
   Amsterdam
   100 employees
job_details.full_text:
Exam Developer with focus on AI Engineering

As an Exam Developer, you coordinate all activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in various systems. Additionally, you review the quality of the exams through item and test analysis. You work on all exams that form part of EXIN's certification portfolio.

   Importantly, you will collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes. You can translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms while maintaining legal, qualitative, and ethical compliance in the outcomes. You stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.

Where you come in

   You are part of a committed team of Exam Developers, working closely with the Product Owner to ensure that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market. You coordinate work with the Exam Developers and with small groups of international subject matter experts or third parties., * Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products
     * Ensuring deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, within budget, and delivered on time
     * (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
     * Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
     * Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices, and company policies
     * Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
     * Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
     * Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
     * Representing EXIN through attending (online) events

   What's in it for you?

   You get the opportunity to further develop your exam-related skills and experience in generative AI, your language skills, and your project management skills. You are part of a strong, hard-working team, that has lots of fun along the way. We offer you the opportunity to join us in creating a healthier digital world. At EXIN, you can make a difference by helping people skill up and be the right fit for their (next) job and by helping organizations ensure they can trust they have the right people on board to deliver their (digital) strategies.

   If you share our belief that independent assessment of knowledge and competencies must be critical for a healthier digital world, you'll be at the heart of progress at EXIN. We offer a role with a great deal of variety, which means you have the opportunity to develop new skills. You'll also have possibilities for continuous learning and access to unique knowledge. Once the exam development processes are including generative AI, you can finetune these and help other teams with their generative AI-related requests.

   You will work in an environment of fun, diverse, and highly educated people. Work schedules are flexible and many of us successfully plan around our young families. Our organization structure is flat, providing room for your initiatives and ideas., Applicants must submit a CV and motivation letter in English. Applications without these documents will not be considered.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the integration of generative AI solutions into existing processes, including fine-tuning LLMs and assisting other teams with generative AI requests. It also mentions translating internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms and staying updated with AI and machine learning research. While there's a mention of 'machine learning algorithms', the core focus is on generative AI applications and their development, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who designs, develops, fine-tunes, and deploys applications built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves coordinating activities related to exam development, aligning products with market needs, and ensuring deliverables meet quality standards, budget, and timelines. This requires understanding the business context of certification portfolios and market demands.
job_tasks.phrase: coordinate all activities related to developing new exams

job_tasks.justification: The role requires ensuring that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market, which is a core aspect of business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure that the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market

job_tasks.justification: Supporting the Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on exam content involves understanding the business's customer-facing aspects and product knowledge.
job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions 'translating internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms' and 'Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards'. It also mentions 'fine-tune these' generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The role involves independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms, which is a core modeling task.
job_tasks.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions the ability to 'finetune these' generative AI models, which is a specific type of model adaptation.
The role involves implementing exam products in various systems and developing and improving exam products, which implies software development aspects related to educational measurement systems.
job_tasks.phrase: implementing exam products in various systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase '(Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement' suggests building or enhancing systems related to exam delivery and management.

Integrating generative AI solutions into processes and helping other teams with their generative AI-related requests implies developing and integrating AI features into existing or new software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate generative AI solutions into our processes

job_tasks.justification: The role involves coordinating activities related to developing, translating, updating, and implementing exam products, which requires managing the lifecycle of these products, akin to MLOps for exam content.
job_tasks.phrase: coordinate all activities related to developing new exams

job_tasks.justification: The role includes updating exams to current standards during maintenance, which is a form of ongoing operational management and updating of products.
job_tasks.phrase: updating the exams to current standards during maintenance

job_tasks.justification: Detecting and resolving issues related to exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions, are key aspects of operational maintenance and improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with subject matter experts and third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products, which is an operational coordination task.
job_tasks.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing, and maintaining exam products
